body_html:
I am not a fan of adding the dependency, as I think everyone will have their own favorite ways of reading images. And PIL is not a real requirement to core TF, so I don't think it is right to brand it like a requirement to TF.

As for installing it to ci, sure.
But that means it will be installed to TF docker images.

body:
I am not a fan of adding the dependency, as I think everyone will have their own favorite ways of reading images. And PIL is not a real requirement to core TF, so I don't think it is right to brand it like a requirement to TF.

As for installing it to ci, sure.
But that means it will be installed to TF docker images.
